messages.title: 5 MORE YEARS OF GORDON BROWN OR CHANGE WITH THE CONSERVATIES
messages.content: In just a few weeks we will have the most important election for a generation. Our economy is burdened by huge debts and millions are out of work. Our society is broken by crime and irresponsible behaviour. Our political system is in a mess. We can't go on like this.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour are now the party of unemployment. Conservatives will get Britain working again by boosting enterprise, job creation taxes and the first ten will abolished by jobs, on businesses profits and growth, it will help people off welfare and into work.

David Cameron has made the NHS our number one priority. We back it and we want to improve it for everyone. The Conservatives will cut the waste in healthcare, not the NHS. We are the only party to have made this commitment.

We will create a new generation of schools run by teachers and responsible to parents, not micromanaged by politicians. Parents will get what they want; smaller schools with smaller classes, good behaviour, great teachers, and restored confidence in the curriculum.

Families are the foundation of a strong society. Our plans to improve Sure Start with 4,200 extra health visitors, flexible working, tax breaks, tax free and flexible and new schools with help make Britain the most family-friendly country in Europe.

issues.economy: Our economy is burdened by huge debts and millions are out of work.
issues.education: We will create a new generation of schools run by teachers and responsible to parents, not micromanaged by politicians.
issues.governance: Our political system is in a mess. We can't go on like this.
issues.health: David Cameron has made the NHS our number one priority. We back it and we want to improve it for everyone.
issues.socialWelfare: Families are the foundation of a strong society. Our plans to improve Sure Start with 4,200 extra health visitors, flexible working, tax breaks, tax free and flexible and new schools with help make Britain the most family-friendly country in Europe.

images.caption: Image of leaflet with titles 'GETTING BRITAIN WORKING', 'BACKING THE NHS', 'RAISING STANDARDS IN SCHOOLS' and 'SUPPORTING FAMILIES'.
